setup_posture.feedback: Neutral stance but ball position is slightly too far forward.

backswing_mechanics.feedback: Arms dominate the takeaway with limited shoulder turn.

downswing_impact.feedback: Steep angle of attack leads to glancing contact and weak fades.

balance_finish.feedback: Finish is upright with weight not fully committed to the lead side.

consistency_athleticism.feedback: Good effort and speed, but sequencing limits efficiency.

what_was_good: Good intent to swing aggressively with the driver.
what_was_bad: Over-the-top transition causing a steep downswing.
Lack of torso rotation in the backswing.

immediate_focus.why_it_matters: A steep downswing reduces distance and increases side spin.
immediate_focus.simple_fix: Start the downswing by rotating your hips while keeping your back to the target slightly longer.

confidence_note: Driver-specific issues identified; analysis would benefit from impact location data.
